extracted-table.table-caption: Demographic and clinical characteristics of the participants.

caption.p: Demographic and clinical characteristics of the participants.

fn.p: χ2-test was used for sex; ANOVA was used for age and for MMSE, GDS, CDR, FAQ, and NPI-Q scores. AD—Alzheimer’s disease; MCI—mild cognitive impairment; NC—normal control; MMSE—Mini-Mental State Examination; GDS—Geriatric Depression Scale; CDR—Clinical Dementia Rating Scale; FAQ—Functional Activities Questionnaire; NPI-Q—Neuropsychiatric Inventory Questionnaire.
